mapper.update: UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=1, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=0
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=2, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=1
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=-1, delay_man=#{delayMan}, delay_reason=#{delayReason}, store_memo=null, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status IN(1, 2)
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=3, delivery_quantity=#{quantity}, delivery_corp=#{deliveryCorp}, delivery_sn=#{deliverySn}, delivery_date=now(), modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=2
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=1, delivery_quantity=null, delivery_corp=null, delivery_sn=null,received=0, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=3
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=8, receive_quantity=#{quantity}, modify_date=now(), receive_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=3
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=-4, close_man=#{closeMan}, close_reason=#{closeReason}, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status IN(0, 1, 2, 3)

UPDATE o_requisition_item SET status=1, type=#{type}, contact=#{contact}, tel=#{tel}, address=#{address}, store_id=#{storeId}, store_name=#{storeName}, store_memo=null, direct=#{direct}, modify_date=now(), handle=0, requisition_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status IN(-1, -4)
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET locked=#{lock}, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id} AND status=2
UPDATE o_requisition_item set handle=#{handle},last_modify_man=#{operator},modify_date=now() where id=#{id}
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET designer_estimate_date=#{date}, designer_memo=#{memo}, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE o_requisition_item SET contact=#{contact},address=#{address},tel=#{tel}, modify_date=now() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE o_requisition_item set priority=#{priority}, modify_date=now() where id=#{id}
